intro: Dasyglossum mentigerum, commonly known as the sweetleaf plant, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its aromatic leaves and small, clustered white flowers that bloom in summer. The plant is native to southern Africa and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. It has a distinctive, sweet-smelling scent, which is most prominent when the leaves are crushed. Dasyglossum mentigerum is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and pleasant fragrance.
